main.name: Mathias Alejandro Podesta
main.description: I am an Electronic Engineer and I work in software since 2019. I use React and NodeJS to develop projects
main.bio: I'm from Argentina and love tech so I studied electronic and IT. I like working in teams and share knowledge. My hobbies are sports like football ,going to the gym and enjoying time with my wife and family
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.
